metadata.author: Security Scanner Team
metadata.description: Detects Blackmoon FTP Server version from FTP banner. This pattern matches the banner response commonly returned by Blackmoon FTP Server.

test_cases.input: 220 BlackMoon FTP Server Example Version 1.2.3 Build 456 Some extra info
220 BlackMoon FTP Server v3.4.5 Build 789 ready
